name: I Want Halloween 2021 Tuned
description:
WARNING, THIS VISUAL NOVEL CONTAINS ADULT HUMOR AND 18+ M/M SCENE AND CONTROVERSIAL TOPICS SO PLEASE DOWNLOAD AT YOUR OWN RISK. THANK YOU!!!

This is a very short visual novel I made for fun reasons with Visual Novel Maker back in years ago. Decided to fine-tune it a bit and upload to the public. It will most likely be my one last visual novel project.

Features: 

Intro videos in both English and Cantonese (Audio + Subtitles)

Cringy voice acting (Cantonese only, in both languages)

Bad artworks

Subtitles in English and Cantonese.
